language.item: Please fill in all required fields.
Please maximize your browser for using this application.

You are about to begin a short (5-10 minute) interactive survey comprising of three steps. {br}{br} We will use what you tell us to develop a better understanding of how people value green and blue space for health and wellbeing. {br}{br} Please click on the continue button. By opting to continue, you are agreeing to our {b}{a data-toggle="collapse" href="#collapseEthics" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapseExample"}Data Privacy and Ethics{/a}{/b}. If you do not agree, select cancel to Exit.
Please enter your user code. Please note, that in this demo any user code will be accepted.{br}{br}{i}Tip: This is an optional step and you can deactivate it in your own survey.{i}
Connection to server failed. Please try again.

Re-read the cards from the {b}"AGREE"{/b} pile. Select the two statements you most agree with and place them on right side of the score sheet below the "+2". You can scroll through the statements by using the scroll bar. {br}{br} Now read the cards in the "DISAGREE" pile again. Just like before, select the two statements you most disagree with and place them on the left side of the score sheet below the "-2".{br}{br}Next, select the statements you second most agree/disagree with and place them under "+1"/"-1". Follow this procedure for all cards in the "AGREE" and "DISAGREE" pile.{br}{br} Finally, read the "NEUTRAL" cards again and arrange them in the remaining open boxes of the score sheet.
Now you have placed all cards on the score sheet. Please go over your distribution once more and shift cards if you want to.{br}{br}
Finally, please answer the following anonymous questions about you.{br}{br}
You have now finished the survey. Please submit your data now.
Data submission failed. Please try again or mail your results via email/post.
You can either submit your data either via email or post. In the former case you'll need an email client like Outlook, in the latter a printer.
